about_the_game:
Instant combat

Retro top-down angle real-time combat - proficiently use rolling, blocking, or shifting skills to play monsters between your palms.
Skills - Choose the most suitable genre among numerous skills.

Cool battle armor

Transformation of War Armor - In the face of strong enemies, call for ancient technological battle armor, use powerful force to repel strong enemies and defend the homeland.
Armor Collection - Collect ancient armor from various powerful opponents to bring your strength back to the right place.

Hand drawn art style

Exquisite 2D hand drawn art - not limited to pixel art, using high-definition hand drawn to depict adventures, the game is filled with elegant details, bringing a more realistic and stunning gaming world.

Travel exploration

Riddles and Rewards - During the journey, you will encounter some interesting puzzles and use your intelligence to win rewards.
Underground Maze - Lost underground mazes in various parts of the continent waiting for warriors to explore, and ancient treasures are also waiting for their true owners.

Adventure Story

The ups and downs of adventure - ordinary adventure stories hide deeper secrets, experiencing unexpected twists and turns.
Partner's Story - Adventure with six partners, have the opportunity to delve deeper into their stories and help teammates make future decisions.

Beyond adventure

Repair Base - In order to fight against evil, we need a more stable stronghold and work with our partners to establish a base to fight against destruction!
Leisure games - farming, gathering, fishing, cooking, adventure and full of life atmosphere.
